pr_title: Add support for registering classes for JNI runtime access

timeline.bodyText: Maybe I should just give the class name as a string, avoiding the dependency? I'll try that.
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText: So that's what I ended up doing. Makes the Kafka Streams quickstart pass for me.
replies.author: gunnarmorling
